headline: Ask HN: Homomorphic encryption: Is govt tampering a real fear for FHE research?
description:
Dear HN,

I have been fascinated by the potential of homomorphic encryption [1] to disrupt privacy-preserving data analysis and have been following the research in this area closely. Recently, I have become increasingly concerned about the possibility of government tampering with homomorphic encryption schemes, which could have devastating consequences for the security and privacy of users.

Is this a real fear for FHE research? If so, what are the best ways to protect against it?

[1] https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Homomorphic_encryption
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 同态加密。政府篡改是对FHE研究的真正恐惧吗？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 同態加密。政府篡改是對FHE研究的真正恐懼嗎？
description_zh-Hans:
亲爱的HN,

我一直对同态加密[1]扰乱隐私保护数据分析的潜力着迷，并一直密切关注这一领域的研究。最近，我越来越担心政府可能会篡改同态加密方案，这可能会对用户的安全和隐私造成破坏性的后果。

这对FHE研究来说是一个真正的恐惧吗？如果是的话，有什么最好的方法来防止它？

[1] https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Homomorphic_encryption
description_zh-Hant:
親愛的HN,

我一直對同態加密[1]擾亂隱私保護數據分析的潛力著迷，並一直密切關注這一領域的研究。最近，我越來越擔心政府可能會篡改同態加密方案，這可能會對用戶的安全和隱私造成破壞性的後果。

這對FHE研究來說是一個真正的恐懼嗎？如果是的話，有什麼最好的方法來防止它？

[1] https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Homomorphic_encryption
